channel.title: Being un-permanently banned?
channel.description:
I'm not sure of this? i've heard different things from different people. I've heard mostley that if you were banned for botting you would be unbanned in like 3years? wheres proof of this? is it true?
if so.. would i be unbanned in like 2years? [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/5nkhhz.png[/img]

item.title: Being un-permanently banned?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:21, topic:376581”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=472507.msg3457648#msg3457648 date=1294173399]
In 3-4 years after a perm ban, it is removed and the account is 100% reset, including the hp, this happened to some other players, and they were level 1, very rare accs, but i dont think they do that anymore lol
[/quote]
No… Jagex used to completely re-set your account in classic and made it level 1. They no longer do it anymore. They recently started rolling some of your stats back when you botted as a punishment.[/quote]
Oops yeah, it was in classic, though i have seen a lvl 1 on rs2

Read full topic

item.title: Being un-permanently banned?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

drubrkletern:

In 3-4 years after a perm ban, it is removed and the account is 100% reset, including the hp, this happened to some other players, and they were level 1, very rare accs, but i dont think they do that anymore lol

No… Jagex used to completely re-set your account in classic and made it level 1. They no longer do it anymore. They recently started rolling some of your stats back when you botted as a punishment.

Read full topic

item.title: Being un-permanently banned?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:376661”]This got me un perm-banned

[quote]Dear JaGeX

I, Budgie Str have been a loyal player to RuneScape for over 2 years now. I have been a member for 16 months of that time and have helped many players with their own adventures. While playing your game, I have never even heard of a ‘Macro’ or ‘Bot’ nor Used one. I hope you reconsider my case, and hopefully I can get back to RuneScapin’ my Life away

Thanks, Aj[/quote][/quote]You lie…

While playing your game, I have never even heard of a 'Macro' or 'Bot' nor Used one.
That's how I would call it BS if I was jagex.

Read full topic

item.title: Being un-permanently banned?
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

Oh believe me, my appeals were 100% bullshit lies lol

I've never been using bots or anything related too. I lost my job so i have been playing massivly and i swear i have been playing 100% legit. I'm a long time player (3-4years) this is only one of my many accounts and i know that in the past couple months i have been playing A L O T but thats because i'm having some real life issues and i've been depressed and been playing this game for 10+ a day. I'm a well respected and expirienced player and i have never used a macro of any kind. i think this has been a very bad mistake and i hope this will be reveresed because i'm a long time lover and user of this game. please take this into consideration because this game is a part of my life, thanks. -Alex
Jagex, I have never used a source of macros for an advantage in game play in RuneScape. I have however been playing at a efficient rate of close to 10hours+ of game play per day. I did however browser the forums and post my progress there. I can see how you might think i used this method of using a macro because of the spike in game play. But rest assure that this is a big misunderstanding. you can see how long I've played this game and I've never done anything remarkably close to this. I would truly appreciate to remove this offense. Thanks

-Long time Lover and Player.

Read full topic

item.title: Being un-permanently banned?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[quote=“abatssk8ter, post:7, topic:376581”]My appeals were pretty convincing if i do say so myself.[/quote]So were mine… but you gotta say shit like, you want another chance and shit… u gotta make more lies up then what you tell your mum

Read full topic

item.title: Being un-permanently banned?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

I was permanently banned once, then when jagex got a new ceo I was unbanned. Three months later I became permanently banned again due to botting. It has been 2+ years since then.

Unless jagex removes all permanent bans like they did when the new ceo came(which is not likely) you will not be unbanned.

Read full topic

My appeals were pretty convincing if i do say so myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Being un-permanently banned?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Well I was banned permanetely on a game, basically you’re not getting unbanned unless you make up a good appeal. My first appeal got rejected, 2nd got rejected but they said to appeal again in 6 months, so I did and I got unbanned. Btw this wasn’t in RS, so it might be different.

Read full topic

item.title: Being un-permanently banned?
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:3, topic:376581”]… definintion of permanent -.- :
intended to exist or function for a long, indefinite period without regard to unforeseeable conditions[/quote]That’s what i didn’t understand, how can you be un-banned from a perm? xD

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:4, topic:376581”]Why would you wait 3 years anyway?? [/quote]I could sell the account for ALOT of money.

Read full topic
